body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jesse Richardson and the customer's name is Ruth Turner.  The conversation is about a random business (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about pricing.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for calling Stellar Customer Support. My name is Alex. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Alex, my name is Sarah.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sarah! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having trouble accessing my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Sarah. Could you please provide me with your account ID number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's A B C one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. For verification purposes, can you please confirm the last four digits of your registered phone number?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, Sarah. I'll look into this right away. Please hold on for a moment.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your patience, Sarah. I've reset your account and you should be able to access it now. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thanks for your help!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sarah. Thank you for your time. Have a great day!
